section_a.beneficiaries: al The company’® activities will provide benefit to ... This is a training company. The company has been set-up to support: e Parents of children in the early years age range to access training to enhance their skills for employment or to further develop their knowledge and skills to parent. Training will be subsidised or free. e Support staff in employment within early years to enhance their professional development through accessing affordable or free training opportunities. e To allow members of the community to enrol on early years based courses to enhance current skills further or provide them with new skillsAraining/knowledge to enhance their skill set. The company initially looks to support the local community (East Sussex) which will include current early years practitioners, people wishing to enter the early years sector and parents of children in the sector who want to improve their parenting skills. The company seeks in time to extend the geographical range in which it works, rolling out the model to other counties
